News.headline: Live Commentary from Tonights Action at Maidstone United
News.page_title: Live Commentary from Tonights Action at Maidstone United
News.URL_keywords: Live Commentary from Tonights Action at Maidstone United
News.short_description: We will be broadcasting live at the Gallagher Stadium tonight for the Daggers' fixture against Maidstone United
News.description:
If you cannot make tonight's Vanarama National League away fixture against Maidstone United you will be able to access full live commentary on Daggers Player.

For tonight's game the Dagger's will have a live commentator and summariser describing this evenings football.

Don't forget to subscribe to Daggers Player now to get exclusive Dagenham & Redbridge content online, on your tablet and on your mobile.

With Exclusive content such as:
  • Interviews with players and manager during the week and post match
  • Exclusive extended highlights from all Dagenham & Redbridge games
  • PlayerHD Live audio commentary and live updates from the Premier League to the National LeagueÂ 

Daggers Player is available to purchase monthly and Annually.

To Subscribe click here.
